verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Trust, surrender, believe, receive.
Trust, surrender, believe, receive
(keep singing chorus during verse)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be still and know that I am God
Be still and know that I am God
Oh, I gave my life for you,
I laid it down for you,
You know you can trust me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
... And remember,
Be still and know that I am God
Be still and know that I am God,
Let me into your heart,
Oh let me know your whole mind.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
... And remember
Trust, surrender, believe, receive....

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Be still and know that I am God,
Be still and know
Be still and know that I am God,
Be still and know
